trans-unit.source: You can now choose to have shared or separate pinned tabs across multiple browser windows.
trans-unit.target: You can now choose to have shared or separate pinned tabs across multiple browser windows.
trans-unit.note: Info message to users about option to adjust behavior of pinned tabs

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to share pinned tabs across all windows?
trans-unit.target: Are you sure you want to share pinned tabs across all windows?
trans-unit.note: Content of warning before switching from per window pinned tabs to shared pinned tabs Title of warning before switching from per window pinned tabs to shared pinned tabs
Preferences > Tabs > Pinned tabs are different in each window

trans-unit.source: You can change this anytime in Settings.
trans-unit.target: You can change this anytime in Settings.
trans-unit.note: Info message to users about option to adjust behavior of pinned tabs
Preferences > Tabs > Pinned tabs are shared across all windows
Title for pinned tabs discovery dialog
Menu item for hiding the AI Chat shortcut
Beginning of the setting for pinned tabs. It's either 'Pinned tabs are shared across all windows' or 'Pinned tabs are different in each window'

trans-unit.source: Warn me on sites flagged for phishing or malware.
trans-unit.target: Warn me on sites flagged for phishing or malware.
trans-unit.note: Checkbox that enables or disables the phishing and malware detection feature in the browser

trans-unit.source: History is only stored on your device and can be deleted at any time using the Fire Button.
trans-unit.target: History is only stored on your device and can be deleted at any time using the Fire Button.
trans-unit.note: Message for the history view onboarding popover explaining that history is kept locally.
